name: Multitool
description: The new multitool can be used for a wide range of applications, such as sawing, cutting, cutting out wood, metal, plastic and plasterboard.

name: Cordless floodlight hand lamp
description: Never be in the dark again: The new WL 2800 18.0 rechargeable floodlight with 7 LEDs and 2800 lumens for a lighting range of up to 630m. Perfect flexibility with the FLEX 18 V rechargeable batteries or 12 V cigarette lighter.

name: Cordless connect
description: Perfect combination: Cordless Connect + extraction unit + battery-powered unit. Automatic switching on and off of the extraction unit by the new FLEX radio-controlled socket

name: Single-hand random orbital sander
description: Compact, lightweight, brushless motor - the new ORE 2-125 EC random orbit sander with electronic speed adjustment for ergonomic and joint-friendly working

name: One-hand orbital sander
description: Brushless motor, compact design and soft-touch switch with quick-stop ensure optimum guidance of the new OSE 2-80 EC orbital sander in every situation.

name: Delta sander with speed control
description: Compact, lightweight, ergonomic: One-handed delta sander ODE 2-100 EC. Unique flexibility thanks to multi-hole pad for holding all sandpapers with 125mm diameter.
